recipesJson.name: Cookies 1707 | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, and Folkart. Ok, ….we got a little geeky with this one.  What does 1707 have to do with Butter Beer? Well, if you're as geeky as I am when it comes to Harry Potter, you'll know that Butter Beer 1707 is a "special reserve" type of Butter Beer.  So what does Butter Beer 1707 taste like? We have no idea, but we imagined it might have a spicier note to it. That's why we used FLV Root Beer to differentiate this Butter Beer from any other Butter Beer. Mix it up, I think you'll be amazed!  Full recipe notes on DEVELOPED Episode 50 at https://youtu.be/Xe2mVMbVkLE  .

Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.

Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com - We now have Merch!
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

![Legacy](https://i.imgur.com/97yskRE.png)


If you would like to support DEVELOPED, the best way is to check out our LEGACY one shot line at https://www.DIYFlavorChaser.com/developed

reviews.text: I wanted to love this because I thought it was so interesting and creative, the idea of butter beer cookies. It seems like they got the profile down fairly well, but I just could not get into it. I think it has too much of that VT Butter Toffee Base. I get a strong sour milk twang from that one and I think it tastes a bit more like movie theater butter than real butter. I’d hoped they’d tamed it but I get enough of that here I actually found the recipe a little naueasting. Sorry guys.
